title: Motorola rolls out its first Android 12 update to the mid-range Moto G Pro
content:
Android 12’s rollout has been pretty quick on Samsung devices, but it’s been taking its sweet time to arrive on other devices. After announcing its commitment to Android 12 recently, Motorola has started rolling out the update, with the Moto G Pro first in line.

more…

The post Motorola rolls out its first Android 12 update to the mid-range Moto G Pro appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Motorola has just started rolling out Android 12 to the Moto G Pro, the company's first update to the latest platform version.
